Cricket features numerous prestigious tournaments and leagues worldwide.

International Tournaments:
• ICC Cricket World Cup: Premier ODI tournament (every 4 years)
• ICC T20 World Cup: Global T20 championship (every 2 years)
• ICC Champions Trophy: Elite ODI tournament
• ICC World Test Championship: Test cricket's pinnacle

Premier Domestic Leagues:
• Indian Premier League (IPL): World's richest T20 league
• Big Bash League (BBL): Australia's premier T20 competition
• Caribbean Premier League (CPL): West Indies T20 league
• Pakistan Super League (PSL): Pakistan's premier T20 league

Traditional Competitions:
• The Ashes: Historic England vs Australia Test series
• Border-Gavaskar Trophy: India vs Australia Test series
• County Championship: England's premier first-class competition
• Sheffield Shield: Australia's premier first-class competition

Women's Cricket:
• ICC Women's World Cup: Premier women's ODI tournament
• ICC Women's T20 World Cup: Global women's T20 championship
• Women's Big Bash League (WBBL): Australia's women's T20 league
• The Hundred Women's Competition: England's premier women's league

Regional Tournaments:
• Asia Cup: Asian nations ODI/T20 tournament
• Tri-Series: Three-nation tournaments
• Bilateral Series: Two-nation competitions
• Youth World Cups: Under-19 global competitions

Tournament Formats:
• Round Robin: All teams play each other
• Knockout: Elimination-based progression
• League + Playoffs: Combined format
• Points System: Based on wins, ties, no-results
